name: Abomination
description:
A simple little platform game, Abomination is about a truly weird creature on a quest to retrieve its Teddy-bear...

Thanks to its sharp claws, the Abomination can climb up walls and even hang from the roof if it's made of wood. The mechanics are simple:

  1. you can't grip metal unless you're magnetised
  2. you can't climb on stone ceilings
  3. pain = Bad
  4. teddy = Good

Made using Game Maker, the game is heavily inspired by Knytt for its gameplay and Frankenstein and Edward Scissor-hands for its Gothic theme.

Music by Henrik 'Sprakkonsult' Roslund.

Abomination was recently in the Pirate Bay Bundle :)
